metadata.Title: CVE-2018-10058 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: The remote management interface of cgminer 4.10.0 and bfgminer 5.5.0 allowsan authenticated remote attacker to execute arbitrary code due to astack-based buffer overflow in the addpool, failover-only, poolquota, andsave command handlers.

criterions.comment: bfgminer: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
cgminer: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
